desc: An explosives expert and a regular at the Knights of Favonius's confinement room. Also known as Fleeing Sunlight.

battle_talent.normal_desc1: Throws things that go boom when they hit things! Performs up to 3 explosive attacks, dealing AoE Pyro DMG.
battle_talent.normal_desc2: Consumes a certain amount of Stamina and deals AoE Pyro DMG to opponents after a short casting time.
battle_talent.normal_desc3: Gathering the power of Pyro, Klee plunges towards the ground from mid-air, damaging all opponents in her path. Deals AoE Pyro DMG upon impact with the ground.
battle_talent.element_desc:
Jumpy Dumpty is tons of boom-bang-fun!
When thrown, Jumpy Dumpty bounces thrice, igniting and dealing AoE Pyro DMG with every bounce.

On the third bounce, the bomb splits into many mines.
The mines will explode upon contact with opponents, or after a short period of time, dealing AoE Pyro DMG.

Starts with 2 charges.

Jumpy Dumpty is Klee's good friend! She can't help but introduce him to everyone.
battle_talent.final_desc:
Klee's Blazing Delight! For the duration of this ability, continuously summons Sparks 'n' Splash to attack nearby opponents, dealing AoE Pyro DMG.
The knights all believe that Klee must have a lucky star watching over her to have never been hurt by any of her own bombs...

basic_talent.talent2_desc: Displays the location of nearby resources unique to Mondstadt on the mini-map.
basic_talent.talent3_desc:
When Jumpy Dumpty and Normal Attacks deal DMG, Klee has a 50% chance to obtain an Explosive Spark.
This Explosive Spark is consumed by the next Charged Attack, which costs no Stamina and deals 50% increased DMG.
basic_talent.talent1_desc: When Klee's Charged Attack results in a CRIT Hit, all party members gain 2 Elemental Energy.

sof.sof1_desc: Attacks and Skills have a certain chance to summon sparks that bombard opponents, dealing DMG equal to 120% of Sparks 'n' Splash's DMG.
sof.sof2_desc: Being hit by Jumpy Dumpty's mines decreases opponents' DEF by 23% for 10s.
sof.sof3_desc:
Increases the Level of Jumpy Dumpty by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.
sof.sof4_desc: If Klee leaves the field during the duration of Sparks 'n' Splash, her departure triggers an explosion that deals 555% of her ATK as AoE Pyro DMG.
sof.sof5_desc:
Increases the Level of Sparks 'n' Splash by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.
sof.sof6_desc:
While under the effects of Sparks 'n' Splash, Klee will regenerate 3 Energy for all members of the party (excluding Klee) every 3s.
When Sparks 'n' Splash is used, all party members will gain a 10% Pyro DMG Bonus for 25s.
